subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: The Wimbledon runner-up Tomas Berdych ruled himself out of the Czech Republic’s Davis Cup quarterfinal against Chile from July 9 to 11 because of an abdominal muscle injury.
snippet: The Wimbledon runner-up Tomas Berdych ruled himself out of the Czech Republic’s Davis Cup quarterfinal against Chile from July 9 to 11 because of an abdominal muscle injury.
